about_me.text: Hi, I'm a front end web developer with more than {{years}} years of experience. I work mostly with react but I have a particular interest in animations and web 3d experiences.

experience.title: work experience
experience.the_8agency_description: Development of frontend and various backend features using the following stacks:
experience.the_8agency_description_item_1: SCSS | React / NextJS | Redux | NodeJS | Express | MySQL.
experience.the_8agency_description_item_2: HTML | CSS | PHP | CodeIgniter | MySQL | phpMyAdmin.
experience.the_8agency_description_item_3: Creation of 3d interactive demos with Three.js.

education.title: education
education.acamica_description_item_3: Usage of libraries & frameworks: Jquery, Bootstrap
education.cac_description_item_1: Front-end: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Vue
